title: (x) Armored Saint "Nod to the Old School" CD track listing - Comic Sans {Sebastian}
content:
hi to all  
someone can help me to identify this handwriting font, seems like a marker font...  
thanx

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080624181257im_/http:/typophile.com/files/armored_saint_3915.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Armored Saint logo mediaeval font - Old English, Fette Fraktur {Bart H}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080624181257/http:/typophile.com/node/38354 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Super Natural Festival logo - Poster Bodoni {Lex, Marten F} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080624181257/http:/typophile.com/node/38362 "Go to next forum topic")
author: rockberto

comments.content: Looks like the ’evil’ Comic Sans from Microsoft.

Nothing says “Real Swagger” or “Tainted Past” like Comic Sans.

- Lex
